Commands.Shadow Stealth: Increases BRV based on ATK, then BRV × 1.2 + HP attackHigh turn rateSelf: 3 turns SPD Up I; 8 turns ATK Up II
Commands.Wild Throw: 3-hit ranged BRV attack of random potency
Commands.Throw: Ranged BRV attack that ignores defense.High turn rate

Artifacts.Break BRV Up: Raises Max BRV by 5% for 1 turn after breaking an enemy.
Artifacts.Bravery Shadow Stealth: Raises BRV by 10% of Initial BRV after using Shadow Stealth.
Artifacts.Mighty Wild Throw: Raises BRV Damage dealt by Wild Throw by 10%.

Passives.Spirit of Competition: Grants 100% critical hit rate when BRV equals or exceeds Initial BRV and target's BRV is over twice of that BRV.
Passives.Shadow Stealth Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Shadow Stealth.
Passives.Wild Throw Power: Slightly raises BRV damage dealt with Wild Throw.
Passives.BRV Speed Up: Slightly raises Speed when BRV is over 50%.
Passives.Wild Throw Light: Slightly reduces action delay after using Wild Throw.
Passives.Shadow Stealth Charge: Increases the max uses of Shadow Stealth by 1.
Passives.Wild Throw Charge: Increases the max uses of Wild Throw by 1.
Passives.Assassination: Grants a low probability of poisoning the target for 3 turns after an HP Attack.
Passives.Buffed Attack II: Slightly raises ATK with active buffs
Passives.Shadow Stealth Extension: When using Shadow Stealth:• Moderate BRV increase based on ATK• Slight SPD Up boost, duration +2• 5 turns Evasion Up II
Passives.Buff Boost Speed: Moderate MAX BRV boost, slight SPD boost with active buffs
Passives.Wild Throw Extension: When using Wild Throw:• Hit count increased to 6; moderately increased cumulative BRV damage• HP damage every 3 hitsModerate Throw boost
